1.0.name: wordpress/mlb-magic-number-widget
1.0.description: Displays the current Magic for any Major League Baseball team as a sidebar widget. You can place as many different reams as you want in the sidebar by dragging the widget. Boston Red Sox, Baltimore Orioles, Tampa Bay Rays, Toronto Blue Jays, NY Yankees Yankees, Chi White Sox White Sox, Cleveland Indians, Detroit Tigers, Kansas City Royals, Minnesota Twins, LA Angels Angels, Oakland Athletics, Seattle Mariners, Texas Rangers, Atlanta Braves, Florida Marlins, NY Mets, Philadelphia Phillies, Washington Nationals, Chi Cubs Cubs, Cincinnati Reds, Houston Astros, Milwaukee Brewers, Pittsburgh Pirates, St. Louis Cardinals, Arizona Diamondbacks, Colorado Rockies, LA Dodgers Dodgers, San Diego Padres, San Francisco Giants
